text:
Hi Community,

Been testing but wanting to confirm. When sending an RSS email and adding an rss feed url in HS, is there any hubl that can be added to pull in the author image? Could not find any for it being added to an email but not sure if someone knows of another way...

Not sure it should be here, but `{{ slug }}` on hs-search-results page output like an internal slug `0aaa000a-0aaa-0a00-000a-0000a0a0A000` instead the expected slug `hs-search-results`.
Just noticed not only the search results but all the system pages (404...)
In the display options for a field, when referencing a variable that is a boolean field, ~is~ the condition "equal to" should be ~going to be~ `true` ~, `True`, or `yes`?~ (fixed)
